channel.title: Simple questions
channel.description: Is it possibile to make emotions for msn or such using photoshop?Or what program would you recommend?Didnt seem to notice any,if there is can you tell me it?Please and thanks.

item.title: Simple questions
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

There isn’t going to be a ‘Create Smiley Face’ button if that is what you’re looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple questions
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:2, topic:121765”]Yeah, so just save whatever you want to use as an emoticon then go on msn, start a conversation, and click on the little smiley face, then click show all. Next there should be a “Create” button, click that then click “Find image” and browse through until you find what you have made to be an emotcion, then set the buttons for it and away you go.

I would explain with more detail but I am tired and need to sleep, hopefully that ^ will do. :)[/quote]

Thanks but wasnt really looking for that,more to the point on how to make them…but figured it out using ps,but they are so shitty :{

Read full topic

item.title: Simple questions
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Yeah, so just save whatever you want to use as an emoticon then go on msn, start a conversation, and click on the little smiley face, then click show all. Next there should be a “Create” button, click that then click “Find image” and browse through until you find what you have made to be an emotcion, then set the buttons for it and away you go.

I would explain with more detail but I am tired and need to sleep, hopefully that ^ will do.

Read full topic
